name: Jail
short: Jail users to prevent them from sending messages
description: A cog that allows you to jail users, preventing them from sending messages in the server. Features include toggleable functionality and support for multiple jailed users.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs of jailed users per guild.
author: Daniel Bush, A.K.A. Daddy
install_msg: Thanks for installing Jail! Use `[p]jail <user>` to jail someone and `[p]release <user>` to release them.
